title: Add support for Xamarin.Forms on netcoreapp3.1
body:
**Description of Change**

Adds the `netcoreapp3.1` to the list of TFMs supported by SkiaSharp.Views.Forms (WPF)

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1561

**API Changes**
None.

**Behavioral Changes**
None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of main at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
